document.full_text: as iowa governor, tom vilsack was a proponent of corn-based ethanol, which drew some criticism from environmentalists because increased corn production led to the plowing over of wetlands. now, however, he is championing water quality programs.
document.title: the agriculture chief as water advocate
lines_and_colors: as iowa governor, tom vilsack was a proponent of corn-based ethanol, which drew some criticism from environmentalists because increased corn production led to the plowing over of wetlands. now, however, he is championing water quality programs.
